column1: Topic title: I have a funny feeling that GE14 will be Feb 2018

column8: text

it will coincide with Chinese new year. then the Chinese will make noise and the Malays will tell Chinese to respect perlembagaan of the country. such friction will make Malays unite behind UMNO.actually more like bulan kempen is feb 2018 then real election somewhere in march 2018.
08032018Mark this to your phone ?
Cast vote is only few hours , and many who never change address can vote this time round no need take extra leave
nola, this year need to do some housecleaning like selling off proton. need some cooling period.
Aiks. This year my teacher cousin got called up for meeting. For some pre election briefing.
That is correct. However they also dont know the exact date for election yet.
My unimate, which is macai BN now, said could be this year as Najib want to expedite it.
my school edy marked as voting centre and a few of our staff edy called for voting officer. I prettt sure its going to be very soon, like in august.

i dont care when it is la.... i know for sure the state vote belongs to who for sure already ... only the federal vote for that gives me headache so i dont want to vote la... if you which one would you choose??? UMNO vs PAS...
Why would the Chinese complain? And why would Malays tell Chinese to respect perlembagaan? If it affects the holidays both side will also complain.
inb4 someone post 'not everyone is like that'~
sounds racism
im fine with it, can give angpao early dulu
how funny is it ?

I think no matter what umno still win.They have been in politiks for how long? U need to wait for the old gooks to die b4 the young people take over. Old gooks still make up majority of the voters and ayam sure 99% on lyn is not even voters.Even so the 1% that has voting rights ok /k majority of them actually lurkig here and will vote bn anytime.True storeyz.
If it is true, I'm sure my dad will tell me not to come back during CNY. Back during election.
wah, sacrifice reunion dinner for voting ar? ini betul betul semangat.
If many kaki back for election, then we can have a reunion at that time.CNY reunion is yearly. Election is 5 years once. Worth sacrifice.
better still .... additional days off .... can balik kampung vote ....maybe big familes can come together ... organize dragon dance with DAP dragon

on or before 24 aug 2018~

makes sense,
